ThingDef.label: AI assistant artistic module
ThingDef.description: The artistic module enriches the AI Assistant with an extensive knowledge of art techniques, styles, and historical references. It allows the AI Assistant to provide real-time guidance, inspiration, and feedback to help the user develop their artistic skills and produce captivating works of art.\n\nFor ease-of-use AI modules are packaged in a small handheld device. When in close proximity with an AI assistant microcomputer the unit can be enabled to wirelessly transfer its data. Due to the way the modules are designed however, they can only be used once.
